members.docComment:
/**
 * Flatten first arg if it is an array Allows fn with ...rest signature to be called with an array instead of spread Example:
 * ```
 * // See entity-action-operators.ts
 * const persistOps = [EntityOp.QUERY_ALL, EntityOp.ADD, ...];
 * actions.pipe(ofEntityOp(...persistOps)) // works
 * actions.pipe(ofEntityOp(persistOps)) // also works
 * ```
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: flattenArgs

docs.summary:
Flatten first arg if it is an array Allows fn with ...rest signature to be called with an array instead of spread Example:
```
// See entity-action-operators.ts
const persistOps = [EntityOp.QUERY_ALL, EntityOp.ADD, ...];
actions.pipe(ofEntityOp(...persistOps)) // works
actions.pipe(ofEntityOp(persistOps)) // also works
```
